description:
pdfmake
Client/server side PDF printing in pure JavaScript

client-version bower install pdfmake
server-version npm install pdfmake
instructions: Use the plugin actions in a workflow to create the pdf and finish it with a download, print or open pdf action.
name: PDFmake
plugin_instructions:
See forum thread for instructions: https://forum.bubble.is/t/new-plugin-pdf-conjurer/43240

Use the search tool to find specific information in that topic.

Also, you can find some consolidated instructions here, but mind you, this doc page is still in alpha stage:

https://bubble.io/page?name=index&id=sdfsfsdfsdf&tab=tabs-1

Also, this plugin is community led, which means there is no official roadmap for it! You are the one who requests new features and reports bugs to be fixed.
